sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function MovieCard({ movie, link }) { const content = ( <> {movie.title} imdbID: {movie.imdbId} Author: {movie.director} Year: {movie.year} ) return ( !link ? {content} : {content} ) } export default MovieCard
